pkgmetadata.longdescription: Score Taxon-Level IgA Binding in IgA-Seq Experiments // Functions to calculate indices used to score immunoglobulin A (IgA) binding of bacteria in IgA sequencing (IgA-Seq) experiments. This includes the original Kau and Palm indices and more recent methods as described in Jackson et al. (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.08.19.257501. Additionally the package contains a function to simulate IgA-Seq data and an example experimental data set for method testing.
